A Journey through Sound

Long story short

I grew up playing the guitar since a very young age and I made a little homestudio for myself in the basement where I spent nearly a decade, layering guitars, pedals, and software into rough mixes. These tracks live on my SoundCloud under Eman Safavi. Currently I'm not wishing to continue that journey any more but who knows - maybe one day.
